sentence.Network_en: The flat - topped, twisted little oaks threw light shadows on the grass.
sentence.Network_cn: 平顶而歪扭扭的小橡树在草地上投下淡淡的影子.

sentence.Network_en: Eurasian pink widely cultivated for its flat - topped dense clusters of varicolored flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 广泛种植的平顶、密集、多色串状花瓣的欧亚石竹.

sentence.Network_en: Beyond the river, supported on struts, rose the flat - topped house.
sentence.Network_cn: 河对岸那间平顶屋耸立在几根柱子上.
